doc.title: Web APIs

value.content:
When writing code for the Web, there are a large number of Web APIs available. Below is a list of all the APIs and interfaces (object types) that you may be able to use while developing your Web app or site.

Web APIs are typically used with JavaScript, although this doesn't always have to be the case.

value.title: Specifications
value.content:
This is a list of all the APIs that are available.

B
  • Background Fetch API
  • Background Sync
  • Background Tasks
  • Barcode Detection API
  • Battery API
  • Beacon
  • Bluetooth API
  • Broadcast Channel API
C
  • CSS Counter Styles
  • CSS Font Loading API
  • CSS Painting API

  • Channel Messaging API

doc.summary: When writing code for the Web, there are a large number of Web APIs available. Below is a list of all the APIs and interfaces (object types) that you may be able to use while developing your Web app or site.
